fields.name: ActivityId
fields.description: The activity ID of the operation that produced this result. It is used to correlate across CRP and extension logs.

fields.name: AssessmentState
fields.description: Describes the availability of a given patch.

fields.name: Classifications
fields.description: The classification(s) of the patch as provided by the patch publisher.

fields.name: KbId
fields.description: The KBID of the patch. Only applies to Windows patches.

fields.name: LastModifiedDateTime
fields.description: The UTC timestamp of the last update to this patch record.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The friendly name of the patch.

fields.name: PatchId
fields.description: A unique identifier for the patch.

fields.name: PublishedDate
fields.description: The UTC timestamp when the repository published this patch.

fields.name: RebootBehavior
fields.description: Describes the reboot requirements of the patch.

fields.name: Version
fields.description: The version number of the patch. This property applies only to Linux patches.
